87fb2c1249664710a5e836b6f6a822d0.query: query IntrospectionQuery { __schema { queryType { name } mutationType { name } subscriptionType { name } types { ...FullType } directives { name description locations args { ...InputValue } } } } fragment FullType on __Type { kind name description fields(includeDeprecated: true) { name description args { ...InputValue } type { ...TypeRef } isDeprecated deprecationReason } inputFields { ...InputValue } interfaces { ...TypeRef } enumValues(includeDeprecated: true) { name description isDeprecated deprecationReason } possibleTypes { ...TypeRef } } fragment InputValue on __InputValue { name description type { ...TypeRef } defaultValue } fragment TypeRef on __Type { kind name ofType { kind name ofType { kind name ofType { kind name ofType { kind name ofType { kind name ofType { kind name ofType { kind name } } } } } } } }
87fb2c1249664710a5e836b6f6a822d0.name: Introspection

fbccfa2c8be64acabd6227d2875dba7c.query: mutation ($email: String!, $displayName: String!, $password: String!) { createUser(email: $email, displayName: $displayName, password: $password) { id displayName } }
fbccfa2c8be64acabd6227d2875dba7c.name: Create user

aeb2f660d8a244428d9168d625859306.query: mutation ( $authorId: Identifier!, $subjectId: Identifier!, $emotion: Emotion!, $message: String! ) { createReaction( author: $authorId, subject: $subjectId, emotion: $emotion, message: $message ) { id emotion message creation } }
aeb2f660d8a244428d9168d625859306.name: Create reaction

5b47c65f104a4157a6ad0316b677f23f.query: query ($id: Identifier!) { post(id: $id) { id author { id displayName } creation title contents reactions { id author { id displayName } emotion message creation reactions { id author { id displayName } emotion message creation } } } }
5b47c65f104a4157a6ad0316b677f23f.name: Post by id

2b7f8f6322fd493db6018568363180f3.query: { posts { id author { id displayName } creation title contents reactions { id author { id displayName } emotion message creation reactions { id author { id displayName } emotion message creation } } } }
2b7f8f6322fd493db6018568363180f3.name: Posts list

0c6696a182ae4a1aaa49ba754b366321.query: mutation ($author: Identifier!, $title: String!, $contents: String!) { createPost(author: $author, title: $title, contents: $contents) { id creation title contents author { id displayName } } }
0c6696a182ae4a1aaa49ba754b366321.name: Create post

4ac1d6208222412a9b662feb28c64fce.query: query ($id: Identifier!) { user(id: $id) { id displayName creation posts { id title creation } publishedReactions { id emotion message creation subject { __typename ... on Post { id title } ... on Reaction { id emotion message } } } } }
4ac1d6208222412a9b662feb28c64fce.name: User by id

23d0d8c42562454b9614414244b0400a.query: query ($id: Identifier!) { user(id: $id) { id email displayName creation sessions { key creation } posts { id title creation } publishedReactions { id emotion message creation subject { __typename ... on Post { id title } ... on Reaction { id emotion message } } } } }
23d0d8c42562454b9614414244b0400a.name: Session profile

d76767c6682a4d4baf1e92d2e6cef7e8.query: mutation ( $user: Identifier!, $editor: Identifier!, $newEmail: String, $newPass: String ) { editUser( user: $user, editor: $editor, newEmail: $newEmail, newPassword: $newPass ) { displayName email } }
d76767c6682a4d4baf1e92d2e6cef7e8.name: Edit profile
